"Does this game crash a lot?"
I haven't had a single crash. However, be sure to meet the requirements:
Memory: 2 GB [4 GB recommended]
CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo with 1.86 GHz [Intel Core i3 with 3 GHz recommended]
HDD: 2 GB of free space [10 GB recommended]
Video Chipset: NVIDIA GeForce 9400 (256 MB) - No Support for Intel integrated graphic chipset [ATI Radeon HD 4670 (256 MB) recommended]

x818hovox:
1. What are your computer specs? (graphics card, ram, free hd space, model)
2. Do you not see the beginning intro with the Gameloft logo?
Try waiting a few minutes, your comp is most likely slow + old.

x818hovox:
 What are your computer specs? 
I'm 99% sure they DON'T fit the required. please check the app page in the description to see the required specs.

And yes i do see the logo but after that nothing.

If you see the logo then it's not a problem with your Operating System b/c it's initializing the application and playing the movie (I believe it's an .avi in the app's resources)

First of all, you ram is lacking and I doubt it will run smoothly.
You also didn't include your video card. It's under graphics/display in system profiler.

Chipset Model:	ATY,RadeonX1600
  Type:	GPU

In the future, please read the page I ask you to read before you complain.
"No Support for Intel integrated graphic chipset [ATI Radeon]"

Your videocard: "ATY,RadeonX1600"
